Auto update recipe timer.toolTip: Update recipe list after this many seconds after last click

Show GUI right of inventory.toolTip: Show the GUI right of the inventory, where it could conflict with Just Enough Items, instead of left, where it conflicts with active buffs

Max. enchants.toolTip: Don't consider items for workbench repair if they have more than this number of enchants

Auto focus search text.toolTip: Automatically focus the search box when opening craft GUI

Categorize recipes.toolTip: Categorize recipes by their creative mode tab

Allow MC internal recipe book.toolTip: Allow opening the MC internal recipe book (since 1.12)

Allow special recipes.toolTip: Add Shulker box coloring, tipped arrows, fireworks, repairs to the craftable list
